body:
## Expected Behavior

namespace is created

## Actual Behavior

error when calling the cli

temporal operator namespace create --namespace panacee --address 127.0.0.1:7233
time=2025-05-24T03:16:30.360 level=ERROR msg="failed reaching server: last connection error: connection error: desc = \"error reading server preface: EOF\""

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. use official helmchart with tls configure
  2. execute the command

## Specifications

  - Version: 1.20+
  - Platform: kubernetes

comments.body:
@fabianboerner 
Could you share why you have closed the issue?

title: Cannot create namespace
